title: Behind Closed Doors - Radio Dramas
description:
3 x 45 mins

New posting of a previously posted torrent, following lhe loss of the original torrent after an HDD failure.

3 interlinked dramas, the common theme being barrister Rebecca Nyman, in each case representing somebody in a tribunal.

1 - One of the Lads: A senior policewoman claims unfair dismissal on the grounds of sex. Rebecca represents her at an Employment Tribunal.

2 - Tilting the Odds: An equine vet is charged with doping a racehorse. Rebecca represents him at a professional disciplinary hearing.

3 - Safe House: A man is accused of being a suspected terrorist and is subject to a control order. Rebecca is the Special Advocate at a closed hearing.

In each case, there is no clear line where right lies. Each of the protagonists has to some extent brought their current misfortune on themselves and the outcome is not always clear cut.

An intelligently written and thoughtful set of dramas.
